title: At Orihiv Direction Russia Army Shellled Raspberry, Poltava, Topmock, Novoneliva AF Parriya Region - General ...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Malynivka, Poltavka, Mala Tokmachka, Novodanylivka of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
